    • Method Detail

      • getNextObject

        protected InanimateObject getNextObject(java.util.ArrayList<InanimateObject> nextPossibleObjects)
        Random policy implementation of the getNextObject method. This implementation chooses a random InanimateObject from the ArrayList of InanimateObjects in it's FOV.
        Specified by:
        getNextObject in class Agent
        Parameters:
        nextPossibleObjects - ArrayList that contains all next possible objects from which the agent will choose one depending on it's policy.
        Returns:
        The method returns the next object to which the agent will move.
